notes: This is a gridded (1km) dataset of annual biomass production (Dry Matter Productivity) in West Africa from 1998 to the present. The data includes a mean, comprising of the average production from 1998 to the present. Each pixel value is expressed in kilogrammes of dry matter per hectare. The data is produced from 10-day images of DMP and NDVI from the PROBA-V satellite. The dekdal images are processed by The Flemish Institute of Technology (VITO). The yearly images are produced by Action Contre la Faim using the BioGenerator algorithim. More information on th BioGenerator is available here: http://sigsahel.info/index.php/knowledgebase/
